events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under refund requests due to the customer's need for a refund or exchange.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received.
Hello! I’m Emily from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund, could you confirm the order number and the item you received incorrectly?
My order number is 78345621, and instead of the wireless headphones, I got a USB car charger. I want my money back quickly.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated a full refund to your original payment method and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the fast refund and look forward to the confirmation email.
The refund process has been completed successfully, and the case is now resolved from our side.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and if you need any further assistance, please let us know.
Since the refund was processed and no further queries were raised, we are closing this case today. Thank you for reaching out.
